thread.title: Love the Lenox -
thread.title_full: Love the Lenox - Review of Lenox Montparnasse, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: ericearl
title: Love the Lenox -
text:
We had a great stay at the Lenox we were in a junior suite on the front side of the hotel. The room was so wonderful and has that old French feeling that I love!!Everyone who worked there went out of their way to make sure everything was perfect. So much to do in the area make sure you go to Cafe Le Dome it is one of the great cafes in Paris and should not be missed.
Room Tip: The front rooms were very quiet!!! See more room tips
